title: Hardcore Holly
summary: Robert William Howard Jr. (born January 29, 1963) is an American professional wrestler, actor, and former auto racer, better known by the ring name Hardcore Holly or Bob Holly. He is best known for his 16-year career with the World Wrestling Federation/World Wrestling Entertainment (WWF/E) where he also worked under the ring names Thurman "Sparky" Plugg, Bob "Spark Plug" Holly, and Bombastic Bob, and his notable gimmick "the Big Shot".[1][2][3][5]
